t: About Us — Achla Designs | Minuteman International
s: Family-owned business since 1977, specializing in fireplace accessories and wrought-iron pieces for home and garden. Handmade products overseen by in-house design team. Based in Fitchburg, Massachusetts, with partner workshops in India. Emphasis on beautiful quality products.
